required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Ramelteon for Insomnia Comorbid With Asthma
clinical_study.official_title: Ramelteon for Insomnia Comorbid With Asthma

brief_summary.textblock: This trial will test the efficacy and safety of ramelteon, a selective melatonin agonist, on patients with insomnia comorbid with asthma.

detailed_description.textblock: Subjects with insomnia comorbid with asthma will be randomized to placebo or ramelteon at night for 6 weeks.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline and post-treatment (at end of 5 weeks)
primary_outcome.description: The change in ISI and PSQI from baseline to end of study will be compared between the two groups. PSQI has a score range of 0-21, with lower the number being less sleep disturbances ISI has a score range of 0-28, with lower score meaning less insomnia symptoms

The change in ISI and PSQI from baseline to end of study will be compared between the two groups. PSQI has a score range of 0-21, with lower the number being less sleep disturbances ISI has a score range of 0-28, with lower score meaning less insomnia symptoms

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline and post-treatment (at end of 5 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Score of 0-24, with 24 being the most sleepy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline and post-treatment (at end of 5 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: DSST tests the number of correct digit-symbol pairs that an individual can identify within an allotted period (60-90 sec). It test memory and concentration, among other parameters. DSST score can range from 0-125, with 125 being the most number correct during the allotted time period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Daytime Lung Function (Peak Flow Monitoring) in Liter/Min
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline and during treatment period (during 5th week)

group.title: Ramelteon
group.description: Participants with insomnia and asthma are randomized to Ramelteon 8mg and sleep hygiene for 5 weeks or to placebo and sleep hygiene for 5 weeks. Ramelteon or placebo to be taken within 30 minutes before

group.title: Placebo
group.description: Participants with insomnia and asthma are randomized to Ramelteon 8mg and sleep hygiene for 5 weeks or to placebo and sleep hygiene for 5 weeks. Ramelteon or placebo to be taken within 30 minutes before

outcome.title: Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index
outcome.description: The change in ISI and PSQI from baseline to end of study will be compared between the two groups. PSQI has a score range of 0-21, with lower the number being less sleep disturbances ISI has a score range of 0-28, with lower score meaning less insomnia symptoms
outcome.time_frame: baseline and post-treatment (at end of 5 weeks)
outcome.population: The 2 subjects in the Ramelteon group completed the study. The 1 subject in the placebo group did not complete the study.

measure.title: Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index
measure.description: The change in ISI and PSQI from baseline to end of study will be compared between the two groups. PSQI has a score range of 0-21, with lower the number being less sleep disturbances ISI has a score range of 0-28, with lower score meaning less insomnia symptoms
measure.population: The 2 subjects in the Ramelteon group completed the study. The 1 subject in the placebo group did not complete the study.

outcome.title: Daytime Sleepiness (Epworth Sleepiness Scale)
outcome.description: Score of 0-24, with 24 being the most sleepy
outcome.time_frame: baseline and post-treatment (at end of 5 weeks)
outcome.population: The 2 subjects in the Ramelteon group completed the study. The 1 subject in the placebo group did not complete the study.

outcome.title: Daytime Performance (Digit Symbol Substitution Test)
outcome.description: DSST tests the number of correct digit-symbol pairs that an individual can identify within an allotted period (60-90 sec). It test memory and concentration, among other parameters. DSST score can range from 0-125, with 125 being the most number correct during the allotted time period.

outcome.population: The 2 subjects in the Ramelteon group completed the study. The 1 subject in the placebo group did not complete the study.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.

clinical_results.limitations_and_caveats: Recruitment difficulties led to only 3 participants in the study. Only 2 participants finished the study.
